meanings.definition: A print made from a woodcut.
meanings.sent1: I saw beautiful xylographs hanging in the art gallery.
meanings.sent2: The xylographs in the book were so detailed and intricate.
meanings.sent3: The xylographs of animals in the forest looked like they could come to life.
meanings.sent4: Her xylographs of nature were like windows to another world.
meanings.sent5: The xylographs of flowers seemed to bloom off the paper.

meanings.definition: The art of engraving on wood.
meanings.sent1: Learning xylographs requires patience and precision.
meanings.sent2: The museum showcased the history of xylographs and their significance.
meanings.sent3: The artist's xylographs were so good, they could carve a smile on anyone's face.
meanings.sent4: His xylographs were like whispers of the forest etched in wood.
meanings.sent5: The xylographs on display captured the essence of the ancient craft.
